overview: Ms. Chester is the Director of Marketing and Business Development at lat49, bringing 14 years of sales and marketing experience to her role. Prior to joining th company, Tiffany worked for HollyWords Publicity Inc. and provided marketing public relations services to film and television clients in Vancouver and Los Angeles. Her creativity and writing skills helped build the success of the company and earned her recognition as one of the top 50 “movers and shakers” of the BC film industry. Tiffany began her career marketing the services of healthcare recruitment companies to potential clients in countries around the world.
